title: Kled why are his voice lines so unique?
body: I love it if a rioter could answer this question so i know more about this chamion. From what ive noticed kled has the most unique voice over yet due to fact that he one of the only champs that actually swears like i was whatching a streamer called pawnce tuned in at the right moment and noticed kled saying "Where the F***k are we" after the PBE lagged it was as if he broke the fourth wall along with multiple other swears and i was just wonder why is kled the only champ so far that swears? Was it to fit the whole rural war veteran type feel or what cause it realy has me interested more into the making of this champion.

replies.body: The short answer is, i strongly felt it matched his character.   Kled is highly emotional, crude and proud of it!   It added to understanding him, how he plays, and was funny.   That same language wouldnt really work with Jhin, Tahm, or even Dunkmaster D.
So kled can swear, but graves can only vape?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

> [{quoted}](name=dirtyjob13,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Uit24ZbH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-29T17:51:42.510+0000)
>
> So kled can swear, but graves can only vape?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Kled's swearing is localized to NA, where no one really cares. Tobacco usage on models and in art is global, where there are different regulations regarding depictions of its usage in different nations.

thank you for the reply and that is one of the best answers i think i could have got cause hearing him curse the way he does in game brings me back to memories of my grandpa he is a war vet and a little rural and this just fits to how i remember him nowadays tho i dont even realy notice the southern twang in his voice but when i was a kid it was just so apparent to me and this champ brings me back to those good ol days which i just love.
I was a bit surprised because I thought swearing was off limits. Does this mean that we might see future champions swear as well, if it fits their character?
Im actually suprised no one really know how foul his mouth is. Its pretty suprising
It's offical, Yordle war veterans swear like a sailor.

I think I read somewhere that a Rioter explained Kled's swearing as being humorous in nature, that within context the swears become more "PC" I guess. Plus alot of his VO won't make it over to in game anyway. But yeah the VO's are designed to create the idea of crazed old war veteran. I love them as much as most fans of Kled but the old "if X can have Y, why can't Graves have his cigar?" meme is really over used.
